mapper.select: SELECT rrep_Num, rrep_Content, rep_Num, g1_Num, rrep_Created FROM reviewreply WHERE rep_Num=#{rep_Num} ORDER BY rrep_Created ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviewreply(rrep_Num, rrep_Content, rep_Num, g1_Num) VALUES(${rrep_Num}, #{rrep_Content}, #{rep_Num}, #{g1_Num})
mapper.update: UPDATE reviewreply SET rep_Content = #{rep_Content} where rrep_Num = #{rrep_Num}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) from giupreview g LEFT OUTER JOIN reviewphoto r ON g.rep_Num = r.rep_Num LEFT OUTER JOIN reviewreply rr ON g.rep_Num = rr.rep_Num where g.g1_Num = #{g1_Num} AND rrep_Num IS NULL
